content: worsted-weight flower mittens © by jennifer turmel materials worsted weight yarn in 2 colors needles to achieve desired gauge for example 6sts per inch = women s medium i knit this on us size 3 2 75mm needles for a tight fabric increase needle size and gauge to 5 sts per inch for a larger mitten for a smaller mitten remove edge stitches or use a dk weight yarn instructions are for magic loop cuff 1 with mc cast on 40 stitches join for knitting in the round and knit 2-3 inches or to desired length for k1 p1 rib 2 increase round kfb k4 x8 48 stitches 3 knit 1 round even right mitten chart round 1 needle 1 knit hand pattern pm make thumb increase needle 2 make thumb increase pm knit palm pattern chart round 21 needle 1 knit hand pattern place thumb stitches on waste yarn needle 2 knit palm pattern left mitten chart round 1 needle 1 knit palm pattern pm make thumb increase needle 2 make thumb increase pm knit hand pattern chart round 21 needle 1 knit hand pattern place thumb stitches on waste yarn needle 2 knit palm pattern continue knitting until mitten is finished at the top of the mitten you will have 6 stitches on each needle cut yarn and draw through all 12 stitches twice and weave in ends place thumb stitches on needles and knit until complete you will have 4 stitches on each needle cut yarn and draw through all 8 stitches twice and weave in ends chart
